debug.label: Debug Mode
debug.hint: Leave this disabled unless specifically asked to enable it by Illandril (otherwise, it will slow things down).

pactRoundingMode.label: Pact Rounding Mode
pactRoundingMode.hint: Standard Rounding: Round down when multiclassing with other Pact caster classes, otherwise round up.

leveledRoundingMode.label: Leveled Rounding Mode
leveledRoundingMode.hint: Standard Rounding: Round down when multiclassing with other leveled caster classes, otherwise round up. System Rounding: Let the dnd5e system decide how to round (it will likely round the same way as 'Standard Rounding')

customPacts.name: Custom Pact Caster Progression
customPacts.label: Configure
customPacts.hint: Configure Custom Pact Caster spell progression settings. Note: Custom Pact Caster classes WILL NOT multiclass properly with other Pact Caster classes.
customPacts.title: Custom Pact Caster Progression
